meta.title: Car Services - Sales, Rental & Support | MyCars Bergamo
meta.description: Discover the services offered by MyCars: used cars, rentals, after-sales support, personalized consulting, trade-ins and free evaluations.
meta.keywords: used car services, car rental, trade-in, car consulting, after-sales car support, used car appraisal Bergamo
meta.ogDescription: Used car sales, rentals and complete after-sales services. Discover all the MyCars services for your next vehicle.

blocchi.testo: Each vehicle is carefully inspected and certified to ensure quality, reliability and safety. We only offer used cars in excellent condition, with certified mileage and included warranty.
We help you find the right car for your budget and needs. If it's not in stock, we’ll find it for you through our trusted partner network.
We take your used car and offer you a transparent evaluation aligned with the market. No purchase obligation, maximum convenience.
We're with you even after the purchase: maintenance, warranties, technical support and paperwork assistance. Our service doesn't end at delivery.

meta.title: About Us | MyCars Bergamo – Passion, Reliability and Service
meta.description: MyCars Bergamo: passion for cars, quality vehicle selection, personalized consulting and continuous support. Discover our story.
meta.keywords: MyCars, dealership Bergamo, used cars, car rental, after-sales service, about us, showroom Bergamo
meta.ogDescription: Passion, professionalism and transparency in our showroom in Bergamo. Discover MyCars and our team.

blocchi.testo1: MyCars was born from a passion for cars and a desire to offer customers a personalized, professional and reliable service. Our mission is to make buying and selling vehicles a simple and satisfying experience, with transparency and expertise.
blocchi.testo2: We carefully select each vehicle, guaranteeing quality, safety and great value. Our team is always available to find the perfect solution for your needs.

blocchi.testo1: With strategic locations and a wide network of industry contacts, we offer personalized consulting, free evaluations, and ongoing after-sales service.
blocchi.testo2: Come visit our showroom or contact us for an appointment. We'll guide you to the right car for you.

meta.title: Terms and Conditions | MyCars Bergamo
meta.description: Read the Terms and Conditions for using the MyCars website. Discover the navigation rules, responsibilities and legal rights of users.
meta.keywords: terms and conditions, terms of use, website rules, MyCars, legal liability, Italian law
meta.ogDescription: Read the Terms and Conditions for using the MyCars website, governed by Italian law.

termini.title: Terms and Conditions
termini.intro: These Terms and Conditions govern access to and use of the MyCars website. By using the site, you fully accept these terms. Otherwise, we invite you not to use our services.

utilizzo.title: 1. Use of the website
utilizzo.content: The website is intended for personal and non-commercial use. Any activity that may damage or compromise the operation of the website or interfere with the access of other users is prohibited.

proprieta.title: 2. Intellectual property
proprieta.content: All content on the website, including texts, images, logos and trademarks, is owned by MyCars or licensed. Reproduction, distribution or modification without written authorization is prohibited.

limitazioni.title: 3. Liability limitations
limitazioni.content: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we do not guarantee that the website is free from errors, viruses or interruptions. The use of the information is at the user's risk.

collegamenti.title: 4. External links
collegamenti.content: The website may contain links to third-party sites. MyCars is not responsible for the content, policies or practices of such sites.

modifiche.title: 5. Changes to terms
modifiche.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page and will take immediate effect.

legge.title: 6. Applicable law
legge.content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Italian law. In case of disputes, the court of Bergamo will have jurisdiction.

meta.title: Cookie Policy | MyCars Bergamo
meta.description: Read our Cookie Policy to learn how MyCars uses cookies on this website and how you can manage them in your browser.
meta.keywords: cookie policy, cookie management, privacy, personal data, tracking
meta.ogDescription: Discover which cookies we use and how to manage them.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.intro: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage them. By continuing to browse this website, you consent to the use of cookies as described below.

cosaSono.title: 1. What are cookies?
cosaSono.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help improve your browsing experience by remembering your preferences and collecting anonymous usage data.

tipologie.title: 2. Types of cookies we use
tipologie.content: We use different types of cookies to ensure the proper functioning of the website and to enhance user experience.
tipologie.paragraph: Specifically, we use technical cookies (necessary for website functionality), analytical cookies (to collect anonymous information about user behavior), and third-party cookies (like Google Analytics, for statistical and marketing purposes).

gestione.title: 3. Managing cookies
gestione.content: You can modify your browser settings to accept or reject cookies. Disabling cookies may affect your browsing experience.

consenso.title: 4. Consent
consenso.content: By continuing to use this website without changing your browser settings, you consent to the use of cookies as outlined in this policy.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - MyCars Bergamo
meta.ogDescription: Learn how we manage your personal data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy describes how we collect and manage your personal data.

finalita.title: Purpose of Data Processing
finalita.content: We explain why we collect your data.

trattamento.title: Data Processing Methods
trattamento.content: How your personal data is handled.

diritti.title: User Rights
diritti.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data.

conservazione.title: Data Retention Period
conservazione.content: How long we retain your data.
